1.0.2.name: wordpress/banthehackers-support-badge
1.0.2.description: Show your support for BanTheHackers with a drop down badge. The badge uses minimal real estate showing only a small red bookmark icon on the top right of your website. When a user mouses over this the badge drops down with the "We Support BanTheHackers" message. The message if clicked links your visitors through to BanTheHackers
